movie.title: Captain Phillips
movie.plot: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the US-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.
movie.awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 146 nominations.
